All Classes

Class Description
dashBoardController
This class acts as a controller for the dashBoard.fxml It is the simulator dashboard which allows users to access the various features of the simulation
EditContextOfSimulationController
This class acts as a controller for the EditContextOfSimulation.fxml It allows users to place users in a specific location/room of the house or block window movement
HouseLayoutController
This class acts as a controller for the houseLayout.fxml It allows users to load a house layout
HouseRoomsModel
This class stores all the available rooms extracted from the uploaded house layout text file
InvalidFileTypeException
This class is a custom Exception class for invalid File type uploads It will be thrown if the user uploads an incompatible file type
InvalidHouseLayoutException
This class is a custom Exception class for invalid House Layout uploads It will be thrown if the user uploads an incompatible house layout
LightsToRemainOnController
This class acts as a controller for the lightsToRemainOn.fxml It allows users to select lights they want to remain on when away mode is on
LogMessageModel
This class stores the data to submit log messages to the console in the simulator dashboard
LogToFileModel
This class represents the model which is responsible of outputting logs to an external file
Main
This class is responsible for running the application and opening the various windows and scenes
Observer
This interface is utilized to implement the Observer Design pattern
PermissionsExplainedController
This class acts as a controller for permissionsExplained.fxml It explains to the user the permissions that come with each role
RoomController
This class is responsible for loading the various rooms obtained from the house layout file
RoomModel
This class stores the data of each room in the house
setUpZoneRoomController
this is controller to handle the set up zone and room so the user can add new zone and room to the zone
SHHController
responsible for the SHHTab it is the controller of the SHHTab dashboard would load this tab and view in their setMainController
SHPModel
This class stores the data about the security module (SHP)
SimulationParametersController
This class is responsible for handling the simulation parameters setup by the user
Subject
This interface will be implemented by the Subject being observed in the Observer Design Pattern
Temperature
the temperature class which have 4 attribute so each room would have instance of temperature which have default temperature then user can change the temperature of the room according to their zone or individually
TimerPickerModel
create the timepicker Dialog
UserManagerController
This class is responsible for allowing the user of the simulator to add other user profiles
UserModel
This class stores the data about each user profile
ZoneModel
the zone class so each zone would have instance of temperature which have default temperature then user can change the temperature of the zone
